ai-thag2.47:1.1_0: The conceited mind, addicted to pleasure,
ai-thag2.47:1.2_0: impales itself on its own stake.
ai-thag2.47:1.4_0: there’s a stake, a chopping block.
ai-thag2.47:2.1_0: I declare you the demon mind!
ai-thag2.47:2.2_0: I declare you the insidious mind!
ai-thag2.47:2.3_0: You’ve found the teacher so hard to find—
